thread.section_title: UpRight Law Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of UpRight Law | www.uprightlaw.com
thread.title: Cheryl Morvant
thread.title_full: UpRight Law reviewed by Cheryl Morvant

author: Cheryl Morvant
title: Cheryl Morvant
text: They helped me to afford a lawyer near my area by making monthly payments until it was paid off. One thing that is a negative is that I wasn't told my new husband's income would count with me filing separately. I wouldn't have agreed to do this if I had known since it may have been for nothing if I get denied.
